allow: Bash(ls -la "C:\\inetpub\\wwwroot\\nexopos\\database\\backups"" 2>/dev/null || echo "backups dir not found or empty ")
Bash(# Check if PHP is installed and working, check php.ini location which php ; php --version ; # Check if there are any error logs ls -la /c/inetpub/wwwroot/nexopos/storage/logs/)
Bash(# Check IIS site config - look for applicationHost.config or sites config cat ""/c/Windows/System32/inetsrv/config/applicationHost.config"")

Bash(# Check cached config for Redis and timezone ls -la /c/inetpub/wwwroot/nexopos/bootstrap/cache/*.php ; echo ""===""; # Check raw timezone value for hidden chars cat -A /c/inetpub/wwwroot/nexopos/.env)
Bash(# Check if there''s an SSL cert on the machine # Also check if port 443 is listening ss -tlnp | grep -E ""80|443"" || netstat -tlnp)
Bash(# Check config/cache.php default store grep -n ""default\\|CACHE"" /c/inetpub/wwwroot/nexopos/config/cache.php)
Bash(# 尝试检查 IIS 服务状态 sc query w3svc ; echo ""===""; # 检查端口监听 netstat -aon)
Bash(# 查看 IIS 最新日志 - W3C 日志默认在这里 ls -lt /c/inetpub/logs/LogFiles/W3SVC2/)
Bash("D:\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 8.4\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u wenyuan -pBwy15091620080 -h 127.0.0.1 nexopos_db -e "SELECT id, name, slug FROM nexopos_product_categories WHERE id=1;")
